title: Strengthening Machine Learning Practical Competencies: Medical Simulation-Based Technical Training with Integrated Instructional Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can execute the procedure (how) with over 85% accuracy when performing a lumbar puncture simulation
Learners can explain three or more scientific rationales (why) for each procedural step
Learners can transfer knowledge acquired in simulation environments to new medical scenarios with over 70% applicability
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
